channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Holiday cheer in Tiburon
item.description: The annual Tiburon Holiday Festival and the Belvedere-Tiburon Landmarks Society Holiday Arts and Crafts Sale took place Dec. 6.
item.dc:creator: The Ark

item.title: Belvedere upholds $300,000 fine after fiery hearing on construction delays
item.description: Belvedere upheld a $300,000 construction time-limit penalty against residents David and Julie Flaherty after a court-ordered rehearing.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Welner returns as Tiburonâ€™s mayor with traffic focus
item.description: Tiburon Councilmember Jon Welner and colleague Isaac Nikfar were elected mayor and vice mayor, respectively, on Dec. 3.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Belvedere panel backs $1.38-mil plan to fund seawall, police upgrades, Strip cleanup
item.description: The surplus would shore up the crumbling Beach Road seawall, upgrade police facilities and cleaning up the shoreline under state orders.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister

item.title: Tiburon teen earns Eagle rank as girls stake their place in Scouting
item.description: Haley compressed her journey into just three years, completing more than 50 hours of community service along the way.
item.dc:creator: Tyler Callister
